players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie was the target last night and is dead. I investigated Bob and found he is the mafioso...."
Bob: "Diana's just making things up to shift blame. I'm not the mafia—maybe she's trying to protect herself!"
You: "I'm unsure about the accusations. Diana, why did you investigate Bob specifically?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
